data.fullContent: The car was in the body shop for almost six weeks. It was being repaired after being hit in an accident. When the technician was finally done, the car looked better than it had before the accident. Unfortunately, the owner had to wait another three weeks before he could pick it up. A few days before he was finally ready to get his car, he got a call telling him there was a problem with the insurance money, and it wouldn't be ready until the following week. After another week, the owner got someone to drive him to the body shop, so he could pick up his car. After waiting two hours because the paperwork hadn't been done yet, he finally got his car. He drove away as fast as he could.

q1.translation: 这辆车在汽车修理厂待了将近六个星期。它在一次事故中被撞后正在修理。当技术人员最终完成时，这辆车看起来比事故前更好了。
q1.front: The car was in the body shop for almost six weeks. It was being repaired after being hit in an accident. When the technician was finally done, the car looked better than it had before the accident.
q1.content: The car was in the body ____ for ____ six weeks. It was being repaired ____ being hit in an accident. When the technician was finally done, the ____ looked better than it had before the ____.

q2.translation: 这辆车在汽车修理厂待了将近六个星期。它在一次事故中被撞后正在修理。当技术人员最终完成时，这辆车看起来比事故前更好了。不幸的是，店主不得不再等三个星期才能把它取走。就在他准备买车的前几天，他接到了一个电话，告诉他保险金出了问题，要到下一周才能准备好。又过了一个星期，车主叫人开车送他去汽车修理厂，这样他就可以取车了。由于手续还没办好，他等了两个小时，终于拿到了自己的车。他以最快的速度开车走了。
q2.front: The car was in the body shop for almost six weeks. It was being repaired after being hit in an accident. When the technician was finally done, the car looked better than it had before the accident.
q2.middle: Unfortunately, the owner had to wait another three weeks before he could pick it up.
q2.ending: A few days before he was finally ready to get his car, he got a call telling him there was a problem with the insurance money, and it wouldn't be ready until the following week. After another week, the owner got someone to drive him to the body shop, so he could pick up his car. After waiting two hours because the paperwork hadn't been done yet, he finally got his car. He drove away as fast as he could.

options.sentence: Taking it to the mechanic was the last thing on the owner's list of plans for today.
Unfortunately, the owner had to wait another three weeks before he could pick it up.
He'd been having trouble with it for months and finally had someone look at it.
When that happens the dealer is responsible for putting the car back into working condition.

options.sentence: After being involved in an accident, it took six weeks to repair the man's car.
The car needs a new engine and a new transmission, but the owner wants to get it fixed while it's still actually running.
When the owner got home, he looked up how to replace his muffler and found out it was easy to remove and replace.
The man left his car and he didn't know what to do next because he couldn't afford the repairs himself.
